articles.description: Surpasses the 100-goal mark for World Cup champions Argentina by scoring a hat-trick in their 7-0 friendly win over Curacao.
articles.content:
BUENOS AIRES: Lionel Messi surpassed the 100-goal mark for World Cup champions Argentina on Tuesday by scoring a hat-trick in their 7-0 friendly win over Curacao.
Argentinas leading scorer reached a… [+3506 chars]
